Verses: 1  Neengal Kutravaaligalendru Theerkkappadaadhapadikku Matravargalaik Kutravaaligalendru Theerkkaadhirungal.
2 enenil, Neengal Matravargalaith Theerkkira Theerppinpadiye Neengalum Theerkkappaduveergal; Neengal Matravargalukku Alakkira Alavinpadiye Ungalukkum Alakkappadum.
3  Nee Un Kannilirukkira Uththiraththai Unaraamal, Un Sagodharan Kannilirukkira Thurumbaip Paarkkiradhenna?
4 idho, Un Kannil Uththiram Irukkaiyil Un Sagodharanai Nokki: Naan Un Kannilirukkira Thurumbai Eduththuppodattum Endru Nee Solvadheppadi?
5 maayakkaarane! Munbu Un Kannilirukkira Uththiraththai Eduththuppodu; Pinbu Un Sagodharan Kannilirukkira Thurumbai Eduththuppoda Vagaipaarppaai.
6 parisuththamaanadhai Naaigalukkuk Kodaadheyungal; Ungal Muththukalaip Pandrigalmun Podaadheyungal; Pottaal Thangal Kaalgalaal Avaigalai Midhiththu, Thirumbikkondu Ungalaip Peerippodum.
7 kelungal, Appozhudhu Ungalukkuk Kodukkappadum; Thedungal, Appozhudhu Kandataiveergal; Thattungal Appozhudhu Ungalukkuth Thirakkappadum.
8 enendraal, Ketkira Evanum Petrukkollugiraan; Thedukiravan Kandadaigiraan; Thattugiravanukkuth Thirakkappadum.
9 ungalil Endha Manushanaanaalum Thannidaththil Appaththaikketkira Than Maganukkuk Kallaik Koduppaanaa?
10 meenaikkettaal Avanukkup Paampaikkoduppaanaa?

11 aagaiyaal, Pollaadhavargalaagiya Neengal Ungal Pillaigalukku Nalla Eevugalaik Kodukka Arindhirukkumpodhu, Paralogaththilirukkira Ungal Pidhaa Thammidaththil Vendikkollukiravargalukku Nanmaiyaanavaigalaik Koduppadhu Adhiga Nichchayam Allavaa?
12 aadhalaal, Manushar Ungalukku Evaigalaichseyya Virumbugireergalo, Avaigalai Neengalum Avargalukkuch Seyyungal; Idhuve Niyaayappiramaanamum Theerkkadharisanangalumaam.
13 idukkamaana Vaasal Vazhiyaai Utpiravesiyungal; Kettukkup Pogira Vaasal Virivum, Vazhi Visaalamumaayirukkiradhu; Adhin Vazhiyaaip Piravesikkiravargal Anegar.
14  Jeevanukkup Pogira Vaasal Idukkamum, Vazhi Nerukkamumaayirukkiradhu; Adhaik Kandupidikkiravargal Silar.
15  Kallaththeerkkadharisigalukku Echcharikkaiyaayirungal; Avargal Aattuththolaip Porththukkondu Ungalidaththil Varuvaargal; Ullaththilo Avargal Patchikkira Onaaigal.
16 avargaludaiya Kanigalinaale Avargalai Ariveergal; Mutchedigalil Thiraatchappazhangalaiyum, Mutpoondugalil Aththippazhangalaiyum Parikkiraargalaa?
17  Appadiye Nalla Maramellaam Nalla Kanigalaik Kodukkum; Ketta Maramo Ketta Kanigalaik Kodukkum.
18  Nalla Maram Ketta Kanigalaik Kodukkamaattaadhu; Ketta Maram Nalla Kanigalaik Kodukkamaattaadhu.
19  Nalla Kani Kodaadha Maramellaam Vettundu Akkiniyile Podappadum.
20  Aadhalaal, Avargaludaiya Kanigalinaale Avargalai Ariveergal.
21 paralogaththilirukkira En Pidhaavin Siththaththinpadi Seygiravane Paralogaraajyaththil Piravesippaaneyallaamal, Ennai Nokkik Karththaave! Karththaave! Endru Sollugiravan Adhil Piravesippadhillai.

22  Annaalil Anegar Ennai Nokki: Karththaave! Karththaave! Umadhu Naamaththinaale Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththom Allavaa? Umadhu Naamaththinaale Pisaasugalaith Thuraththinom Allavaa? Umadhu Naamaththinaale Anega Arpudhangalaich Seydhom Allavaa? Enpaargal.
23  Appozhudhu, Naan Orukkaalum Ungalai Ariyavillai. Akkiramach Seykaikkaarare, Ennaivittu Agandru Pongal Endru Avargalukkuch Solluven.
24  Aagaiyaal, Naan Solliya Indha Vaarththaigalaik Kettu, Ivaigalinpadi Seykiravan Evano, Avanaik Kanmalaiyinmel Than Veettaik Kattina Puththiyulla Manushanukku Oppiduven.
25 perumazhai Sorindhu, Peruvellam Vandhu, Kaatru Adiththu, Andha Veettinmel Modhiyum Adhu Vizhavillai; Enendraal Adhu Kanmalaiyinmel Asthipaaram Podappattirundhadhu.
26 naan Solliya Indha Vaarththaigalaik Kettu, Ivaigalinpadi Seyyaadhirukkiravan Evano, Avan Than Veettai Manalinmel Kattina Puththiyillaadha Manushanukku Oppidappaduvaan.
27  Perumazhai Sorindhu, Peruvellam Vandhu, Kaatru Adiththu, Andha Veettinmel Modhinapodhu Adhu Vizhundhadhu; Vizhundhu Muzhuvadhum Azhindhadhu Endraar.
28  Yesu Indha Vaarththaigalai Solli Mudiththapodhu, Avar Vedhapaarakaraippol Podhiyaamal, Adhigaaramudaiyavaraai Avargalukkup Podhiththapadiyaal,
29  Janangal Avarudaiya Podhagaththaikkuriththu Aachchariyappattaargal.
